attributes.action: Retire all MP’s who fail to represent the democratic decisions of their Electors
attributes.additional_details: In my constituency, Sedgefield, the Referendum vote was in over 60% in favour of Leave. In Redcar the vote to leave was even higher @ some 67% yet in both cases the Members have distorted those views & are actively campaigning for the opposite  Other Contituencies, across the Country report similar denials of  the Electorate’s  wishes, This compromises truth & denies democracy to the public.   Here, voters are calling for his resignation through the local press. Parliament is being misled
attributes.background: Throughout the Country, particularly in the North, our Elected Representatives are over-riding the democratic decisions of their Electorate and presenting to Parliament an opposing view. Thus the people voice is  not being heard in Parliament, which is being misled by such distortions.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing people from office because of their views or opinions.
